content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location and condition of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 550 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair offer as it considers both your needs as a landlord and my budget.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I believe the apartment's value is much higher. I counteroffer 700 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
While understanding your perspective as the property owner, I must consider my financial capabilities. At 700 Euros per month, the apartment becomes unaffordable for me. Unfortunately, I don't want to continue the negotiation due to this significant price difference. TERMINATE

Remarkable dialogue generated understanding Maryam's perspective while also acknowledging the landlord's standpoint on apartment value. The negotiation ended when Maryam's budget couldn't accommodate the proposed higher rent price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
